channel.title: 317 client wont run right HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
ok so im using a 317, and i compiled it like i have all the other 100 times, and then hit run then i got this message... [code]Whip Lash Client And Source Release! Made By teh SHMEXY Owner Jay And Owner Ry Loading Whip Lash Client!! Error: loaderror Starting up 20 urlstream Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4483) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4263) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
How do i fix this? please help, ive spent hours coding

item.title: 317 client wont run right HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Skillerscapeowner, post:2, topic:260416”]uhm, edit your run.bat and see if it has the right java that you have it might say this: @echo off
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.16-ga-bin.jar server
change the 16 to 17 or what ever you have. it will say all that stuff before it says what i just posted.
reguards,
Skillerscapeowner (Luke)[/quote]

That doesn’t throw a NullPointerException.

Read full topic
